articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Men's FTP: India and Australia to play two five-Test series in the next four years - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The 12 Full Members will play a total of 777 international matches between 2023 and 2027, compared to 694 in the current FTP cycle
articles.content: Australia will host India for five Tests in the 2023-25 cycle, and then travel to India for five Tests in the 2025-27 cycle  •  Patrick Hamilton/AFP/Getty Images

articles.content:
• Controversy has erupted over induction of RJD MLC Kartikeya Singh
